stimulusHtml: Which of the following best explains why regional identities have led to independence movements in the United Kingdom but not in Mexico?
choicesHtml: More extreme differences in the level of economic development between regions in the United Kingdom.
A history of the regionsâ€™ existence as separate states in the United Kingdom.
More recent experience of civil war in the United Kingdom.
A federal system that contains an explicit constitutional mechanism for secession in the United Kingdom.
